ChangeList.Description: Added the **certificateSerialNumber** property to the [applePushNotificationCertificate](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-applePushNotificationCertificate?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **iccid** property to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **udid** property to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **notes** property to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **ethernetMacAddress** property to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **physicalMemoryInBytes** property to the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the `windowsAzureADJoinUsingDeviceAuth` member to the **deviceEnrollmentType** enumeration.
Added the `appleUserEnrollment` member to the **deviceEnrollmentType** enumeration.
Added the `appleUserEnrollmentWithServiceAccount` member to the **deviceEnrollmentType** enumeration.
Added the **persistEsimDataPlan** parameter to the [wipe](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-managedDevice-wipe?view=graph-rest-1.0) method.
